name: THE LAST TREE (itch) (MilkBoy)
description:
THE LAST TREE

You're a robot wielding a samurai sword set out to defend the last tree from extinction. 

Defeat waves of enemies while trying to keep the tree alive with water.

Fast paced action.
Romantic atmosphere.
Challenging game play.

Let's see how long you'll last, and if you can save The Last Tree!

controls: left and right arrow for movement, space to water the tree, x to attack;
